scripts.clean:dev: rm -rf .next .turbo node_modules/.cache && echo 'âœ“ Cleaned build artifacts (preserved data/ and tmp/)' && npm run dev
scripts.build:ci: rm -f .next/lock && cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_BUILD_TIME=$(node -e "process.stdout.write(new Date().toISOString())") next build --webpack
scripts.e2e:smoke:ci: sh -c 'npm run dev -- --port 3000 > /tmp/next-dev.log 2>&1 & DEV_PID=$!; trap "pkill -P $DEV_PID 2>/dev/null || true; kill $DEV_PID 2>/dev/null || true; wait $DEV_PID 2>/dev/null || true" EXIT INT TERM; wait-on --timeout 120000 http://localhost:3000; set +e; PLAYWRIGHT_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3000 playwright test --project=smoke-billing-admin --project=smoke-billing-resident; CODE=$?; if [ $CODE -ne 0 ]; then tail -n 200 /tmp/next-dev.log || true; fi; exit $CODE'
scripts.e2e:office:ci: sh -c 'if lsof -i tcp:3000 -sTCP:LISTEN >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo "Port 3000 already in use. Stop the server or change the port."; exit 1; fi; LOG=/tmp/next-dev.log; npm run dev -- --port 3000 > $LOG 2>&1 & DEV_PID=$!; trap "pkill -P $DEV_PID 2>/dev/null || true; kill $DEV_PID 2>/dev/null || true; wait $DEV_PID 2>/dev/null || true" EXIT INT TERM; wait-on --timeout 240000 http://localhost:3000; WAIT_CODE=$?; if [ $WAIT_CODE -ne 0 ]; then tail -n 200 $LOG || true; exit $WAIT_CODE; fi; set +e; PLAYWRIGHT_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3000 playwright test --project=smoke-office-admin; CODE=$?; if [ $CODE -ne 0 ]; then tail -n 200 $LOG || true; fi; exit $CODE'
scripts.deploy: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run build && node scripts/release.js
